txt.en: A Trail Marked Indagir
The bile spills seem to follow the road into Tumladen.
Follow the trail of spills into Tumladen
The bile spills have led to Tumladen and keep going further into town.
Follow the trail of spills into Tumladen
Follow the trail further into town
The trail leads into Tumladen...
You found an abandoned waggon with traces of a vile ichor that reminds you of the same substance found in Thaurisgar.
The trail is getting shorter and shorter and must end soon.
The scattered phials have left a trail

The waggon is abandoned with evidence of recent use.

Inside the waggon are scattered phials of a green ichor that look eerily similar to you.

Beside the waggon is a spilled phial. There could have been a struggle here.
You found an abandoned waggon with phials of a familiar substance. This could be the mode of transport Indagir used.\n\nYou should search the waggon to support your theory.
The trail seems to have led to a dead end.
This seems like the same substance you encountered in Thaurisgar. There is a trail of broken phials.\n\nYou should follow the trail leading into Tumladen.
This one leads up the road to the right
The trail of spilled substance has led you to an injured waggon driver.
The spills are getting closer together
There is an injured waggon driver
Indagir once again seems to have escaped

'Huh? Who are you?'

The waggon driver rubs his eyes and tries to focus on you.

'My waggon?'

The driver nods his head.

'Some fellow requested a ride all the way to Linhir. I was happy to oblige, but I noticed the phials he was carrying with him had a very pungent and off putting odour. I questioned him about it and he got defensive and hit me... tried to steal the waggon. One of the patrols noticed and gave chase. So he grabbed what he could of his quarry and ran off. I don't know where he is.

'I am sorry.'
Follow the trail up the road
It seems to follow the road
The trail has led to a dead end
Talk to waggon driver
Search the waggon
This one is headed into Tumladen
Follow the trail of spills into Tumladen
It goes further into Tumladen
The bile spills seem to follow the road into Tumladen.
